trans-unit.source: This is your first time clicking this tab. Would you like to be led through a guide that will help you add a field?
trans-unit.target: This is your first time clicking this tab. Would you like to be led through a guide that will help you add a field?

trans-unit.source:
Your fields list is where you can view and edit detailed information on the relevant activities, data layers, field properties, and more.
**Click the plus button** to add a new field. (Fields can also be added under Setup & Manage.)
trans-unit.target:
Your fields list is where you can view and edit detailed information on the relevant activities, data layers, field properties, and more.
**Click the plus button** to add a new field. (Fields can also be added under Setup & Manage.)

trans-unit.source:
Here you can enter all the details about your field.
**Fill out the “Details” and “Type” sections**. Make sure you select or enter a Grower, Farm, and Field Name.
**Next, scroll down to the “Location” section.** Here’s where you’ll find tools to let you draw the boundaries for your field.
**Click the “Draw field” button.**
trans-unit.target:
Here you can enter all the details about your field.
**Fill out the “Details” and “Type” sections**. Make sure you select or enter a Grower, Farm, and Field Name.
**Next, scroll down to the “Location” section.** Here’s where you’ll find tools to let you draw the boundaries for your field.
**Click the “Draw field” button.**

trans-unit.source:
**Zoom and pan the map** to find your field. Make sure it fills the majority of the screen.
**Draw the boundary for your field** using the tools provided.
**Then click “Done”** to return to the previous screen.
trans-unit.target:
**Zoom and pan the map** to find your field. Make sure it fills the majority of the screen.
**Draw the boundary for your field** using the tools provided.
**Then click “Done”** to return to the previous screen.

trans-unit.source: To finish adding your field, first verify your field information is correct, and then** click Save**.
trans-unit.target: To finish adding your field, first verify your field information is correct, and then** click Save**.

trans-unit.source:
You can now see your new field in the fields panel.
Tapping on the field - in the list or in the map - will center the map and display the field’s details.
You have successfully completed this guide.
trans-unit.target:
You can now see your new field in the fields panel.
Tapping on the field - in the list or in the map - will center the map and display the field’s details.
You have successfully completed this guide.

trans-unit.source: Additional resources can be found in the Help Guides.
trans-unit.target: Additional resources can be found in the Help Guides.

**Then click “Done”** to return to the previous screen.
